transArray.content: The hotel is next to the main road of the Fourth Ring Road. The sound insulation is very good and not noisy at all.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, with convenient transportation. I'm glad to know from your review that this hotel left a good impression on you. Before guests check in, we will conduct ward rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets before disinfecting and cleaning. There are standardized service procedures at every step. Please feel free to check in. , all rooms in the hotel use double-layer soundproof glass to provide you with as comfortable a stay as possible. Thank you for your recognition of us. We will continue to do a good job in all aspects. I believe you will have a better stay experience next time you stay. The hotel looks forward to your visit again and wishes you a happy life!
